meanings.definition: To surpass in glitter or sparkle.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks outglittered the stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The sequins on her dress outglittered all the other outfits at the party.
meanings.sent3: The disco ball outglittered the birthday cake, stealing the spotlight.
meanings.sent4: Her smile outglittered the sun, brightening up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The diamond outglittered all the other gems in the jewelry store.

meanings.definition: To outshine in brightness or brilliance.
meanings.sent1: The lighthouse outglittered the moon on the dark night.
meanings.sent2: The neon sign outglittered the streetlights along the busy road.
meanings.sent3: The glittery shoes outglittered the disco ball on the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her idea outglittered all the others, shining with creativity.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks outglittered the city skyline, lighting up the night.
